comments: Editor of Philosophical Magazine (London) 1798-1825. Born Tulloch in Glasgow but changed to Tilloch when he moved to London.
examples: Cowania D.Don ex Tilloch & Taylor in Phil. Mag., 64: 374 (Nov. 1824).
source: Dict. Nineteenth-Century Brit. Sci., 4: 2021-2022 (2004).  Oxford Dict. Nation. Biogr., 54: 790-791 (2004)
